## voronoise2 variable

IQ's parametric 2D voronoise. Depending on `u` and `v`<!-- -->, this function produces 4 different noise types

- cell noise (0,0) - voronoi (1,0) - perlin noise (0,1) - voronoise (1,1)

[http://www.iquilezles.org/www/articles/voronoise/voronoise.htm](http://www.iquilezles.org/www/articles/voronoise/voronoise.htm)

Note: This implementation uses the improved `hash32` by Dave Hoskins instead of iq's original `hash3`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
voronoise2: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn3<"vec2", "float", "float", "float">
```
